chapter.text: 43|1|Hā mīmu.
43|2|(Jibutsu o) meiryō ni suru keiten ni kakete (chikau).
43|3|Hontōni ware wa, sore o Arabia-go no kuruān to shita. Anata gataga rikai suru tame ni.
43|4|Sore wa waga moto no haha ten no naka ni ari, hijō ni takaku eichi ni eki rete iru.
43|5|Anata gataga hangyaku no mindearu to iu tame ni, ware wa, kono kunkai o anata gatakara toriagete, hōchi dekiyou ka.
43|6|Ware wa ikaga ni ōku no yogen-sha o, mukashi no min ni tsukawashita koto ka.
43|7|Daga yogen-sha ga kuru tabi ni, kare-ra wa chōshō shinai koto wa nakatta.
43|8|Sorede ware wa korera (kuraishu-zoku) yori mo, rikiryō no sugureta mono o horoboshita. Mukashi no hito no rei ga saki ni aru yō ni.
43|9|Moshi anata ga kare-ra ni mukatte,`ten to ji o sōzō shita no wa daredesuka.' To toeba, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`iryoku narabinaku zenchina okata ga sōzō nasa reta nodesu.' To iu.
43|10|Kare wa anata gata no tame, daichi o fushido to nasa re, sono naka ni michi o mōke rareta. Anata gata o tadashiku michibika reru yō ni.
43|11|Mata ten kara tekiryō no ame o furase, sore de shinda daichi o yomigaera se rareru okatadearu. Sonoyōni, anata gata wa (hakaba kara) detekuru.
43|12|Kare wa subete no mono o ittsui ni sōzō shi, mata anata gata no tame ni, fune to kachiku o norimono to shite sonae rareta.

43|13|Anata gata wa, sono se ni anzen ni nori, sore ni noru toki, anata no omo no onkei o nenji,(inotte) iu. `Kare o tataemasu. Korera no mono o watashi-tachi ni fukujū sa seru okata. Kore wa watashi-tachi ni wa kanawanakatta kotodesu.
43|14|Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, omo ni kanarazu kaeru nodesu.'
43|15|Sorenanoni kare-ra (tashinkyō to) wa, kare no shimo be (tenshi) o,(arrā no musume nado to shōshite) kare no bunshin to shite iru. Hontōni ningen wa, onwowasureru.
43|16|Soretomo anata gata wa kare ga tsukura reta mono no naka kara (tenshi o) musume to shite erabi, anata gata wa danji dake sazukaru to demo iu no ka. (Iya sōde wanai. )
43|17|Kare-ra no aru mono wa, jihibukaki okata ni hikiai ni dashita mono (joji no tanjō) o, shirasa reru to, kare no kao wa hinemosu kuraku, hitan ni kurete shimau.
43|18|(Utsukushī) kimono o kite daiji ni sodate rareruga akirakana konkyo ga nai no ni kōron suru mono (o arrā to dōi ni shi)te mo yoi no ka.

43|19|(Sore demo) jihibukaki hō no shimo bedearu tenshi-tachi o, josei to suru no ka. Korera no (tenshi) no sōzō o shōgen dekiru no ka. Kare-ra no shōgen wa kiroku sa re,(shinpan no hi ni) kyūmon sa reyou.

43|20|Kare-ra wa,`jihibukaki okata ga o nozominara, watashi-tachi wa kesshite kare-ra (kamigami) o, sūhai shimasendeshita.' To iu. Kare-ra wa sore ni tsuite nani no chishiki mo naku, tada okusoku suru dakedearu.
43|21|Soretomo ware ga kore yori mae ni sazuketa Keisuke ga atte, kare-ra wa sore o kataku mamotte iru (to demo iu) no ka.
43|22|Iya, kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi wa sosen ga, hitotsu no michi o funde ita no o mite, sono ashiato ni yotte michibika rete iru nodesu.'

43|23|Onajiyōni, ware ga anata izen ni mo, machi no keikoku-sha o tsukawasu tabi ni, sono ji no fuyūna-sha-tachi wa,`hontōni watashi-tachi wa, sosen ga hitotsu no oshie o hōjite iru no o mite imasu. Sorede sono ashiato o funde iru nodesu.' To itte ita.

43|24|Kare (shito) ga,`nanto, sosen ga shitagatte ita anata gata no shiru mono yori mo, yoi michibiki o motarashite mo ka.' To iu to kare-ra wa,`anata ga todoketa mono wa, watashi-tachi wa shinjimasen.' To itta
43|25|sorede ware wa, kare-ra ni hōfuku shita. Miyo, shinkō o kyohi shita mono no saigo ga dōdeatta ka o.
43|26|Iburāhīmu ga, sono chichi to sono hitobito ni kō itta toki no koto o omoiokose. `Hontōni watashi wa, anata gataga sūhai suru mono to zetsuen shimasu.
43|27|Watashi o o tsukuri ni nari, watashi o kanarazu onmichibiki kudasa reru kata ni dake (tsukaemasu.)'
43|28|Kare wa sore o, shison e no eien no kotoba to shite nokoshita. Kanarazu kare-ra wa (omoni) kaeru kotoba to (omotte).
43|29|Iya, ware wa, shinri ga kare-ra no tokoro ni kite, shito ga (jibutsu o) meiryō ni suru made, korera no mono ya, sono sosen no mono o, kyōraku sa seta.
43|30|Daga, shinri ga kare-ra no tokoro ni kita to naru to,`koreha majutsudesu. Watashi-tachi wa, kesshite kore o shinjimasen.' To iu.
43|31|Mata kare-ra wa,`kono kuruān wa, naze 2tsu no machi no yūryokuna jinbutsu ni kudasa renakatta nodeshou ka.' To iu.

43|32|Kare-ra wa omo no jihi o wariateru no ka. Ware wa, gense no kurashi ni hitsuyōnamono o, anata gata ni haibun shi, mata aru mono o soto no mono yori ue ni chii o age, aru mono o soto ni fukusa seru. Anata no omo no jihi wa, kare-ra ga chikuseki shita mono yori, haruka ni tōtoi nodearu.
43|33|Ningen ga (subete fushinjin'na) ichidan to naru osore ga nakereba, ware wa jihibukaki okata o shinjinai mono no tame ni, sono-ka ni wa gin no yane, sore ni noboru no ni (gin no) kaidan o mōke,
43|34|sono-ka ni wa (gin no) tobira, mata kare-ra o (gin no) nedoko ni yorikakara seyou.

43|35|Mata kin no sōshoku mo (hodokoshitadearou). Shikashi korera no subete wa, gense no seikatsu no kyōraku ni suginai. Anata no omo no omoto no raise koso ga,-nushi o osoreru mono no tame no monodearu.
43|36|Jihibukaki okata no kunkai ni me o tsumuru mono ni wa, ware wa shaitān o furi ateru. Sore wa, kare ni tori hanare gatai tomo to narou.
43|37|Kōshite (akuma wa tadashī) michi kara kare-ra o kobamu, shikamo kare-ra wa, jibun wa (tadashiku) michibika rete iru mono to omoikonde iru.
43|38|Ware no moto ni yattekuru toki ni natte, kare wa,`watashi to anata (akuma) no ma ni, azuma to nishi no hedatari ga attanaraba.' To iu. Ā nanto warui tomo (o motta koto) yo.
43|39|Anata gata wa aku o okonatte ita nodakara, kyō to natte wa nani o itte mo yakudatanai. Anata gata wa mina chōbatsu o ukeru.
43|40|Anata wa mimi o katamukenai mono ni kika seru koto ga dekiyou ka. Mata mewosorasu-sha ya, akiraka ni mayoi ya ayamachi no naka ni iru mono o, michibiku koto ga dekiyou ka.
43|41|Sore de tatoe anata o meshiagete mo, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra ni hōfuku suru.
43|42|Mata kare-ra ni yakusoku shita koto o, anata ni miseru koto mo dekiru. Ware ga kare-ra o seiatsu suru nado itomo tayasui.
43|43|Sorede anata ni keiji shita mono o, shikkari to mamore. Hontōni anata wa, tadashī michi o tadotte iru.
43|44|Kore wa anata ni tottemo, mata anata no hitobito ni tottemo, tadashiku kunkaidearu. Yagate anata gata wa,(sekimu ni tsuki) towa reru nodearu.
43|45|Anata izen ni ware ga tsukawashita, shito-tachi ni toi nasai. Ware wa, jihibukaki okata igai ni tsukaerubeki kamigami o oita no ka.
43|46|Hontōni ware wa, mūsā ni samazamana shirushi o mota sete, firuaun to sono chōrō-tachi ni noko wa shita. Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontōni ban'yū no omo no shitodesu.'
43|47|Tokoroga, waga shuju no shirushi o gen wa shita no ni, miyo. Kare-ra wa sore o azakeri waratta.

43|48|Sorede ware ga tsugitsugini kare-ra ni shimeshita shirushi wa, dore mo sono nakama no mono yori, idaina monodeatta. Soshite chōbatsu o motte kare-ra o korashimeta. Kanarazu kare-ra wa (ware no moto ni) kaerudearou (koto o omotte).
43|49|Sonotoki kare-ra wa itta. `Majutsu-shi yo,-nushi ga anata to musuba reta yakusoku ni yotte, watashi-tachi no tame ni inotte kudasai. Watashi-tachi wa hontōni michibiki o ukeirerudeshou.'
43|50|Daga, ware ga kare-ra kara chōbatsu o torinozoku to, dōjini kare-ra wa sono yakusoku o yabutte shimatta.

43|51|Soshite firuaun wa sono min ni senkoku shite itta. `Waga min yo, Ejiputo kokudo, soshite korera ashimoto o nagareru kawa wa, watashi no monode wa nai nodesu ka. Anata gata wa (son'na koto ga) wakaranai nodesu ka.
43|52|Watashi wa, kono iyashī, meiryō ni ii arawasu koto mo dekinai mono yori mo, sugurete iru nodesu.
43|53|Naze kogane no ude wa ga kare ni sadzuke rarenai nodesu ka. Mata naze tenshi-tachi ga, tsukisoi tte kare to issho ni tsukawasa renai nodesu ka.'
43|54|Kono yō ni kare wa sono min o sendō shi,-min wa kare ni shitagatta. Hontōni kare-ra wa, arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta.
43|55|Kōshite kare-ra wa ware o okora setanode, ware wa kare-ra ni hōfuku shi, subete o obore sase,
43|56|kare-ra o kako (no min) to shi, kōsei no mono no tame ni (imashime no) rei to shita.
43|57|Maruyamu no ko (īsā) no koto ga, ichirei to shite (kuruān) ni age rareru to, miyo. Anata no hitobito wa sore o (chōshō shite) wameki tateru.

43|58|Soshite kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi no kamigami ga masaru no ka, soretomo kare (īsā) ka.' To iu. Kare-ra ga kare (īsā) no koto o iu no wa, anata ni, tada giron o furikakeru tame dakedearu. Iya haya, kare-ra wa ronsō-suki no mindearu koto yo.
43|59|Kare (īsā) wa, ware ga onkei o hodokoshita shimo be ni suginai. Soshite kare o, Isuraeru no shison ni taisuru tehon to shita.
43|60|Soshite moshi ware ga nozomunaraba, anata gata no ma kara tenshi o age, tsugitsugini chijō o tsuga su koto mo dekiru.
43|61|Hontōni kare (īsā) wa,(shinpan no)-ji no shirushi no hitotsudearu. Dakara sono (toki) ni tsuite utagatte wa naranai. Soshite ware ni shitagae. Kore koso, tadashī michidearu.
43|62|Akuma o shite, anata gata o (arrā no michi kara) samatage sasete wa naranai. Hontōni kare wa, anata gata no kōzen no tekidearu.

43|63|Īsā ga samazamana meishō o motte yattekita toki itta. `Hontōni watashi wa, eichi o anata gata ni motarashi, anata gataga ronsō suru koto no, tashō no bubun o anata gata no tame ni, tokiakasu tamedearu. Sorede arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagae.
43|64|Hontōni arrā koso wa watashi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru. Kare ni tsukae nasai. Kore koso, tadashī michidearu.'
43|65|Daga kare-ra no ma no shoha wa, naka tagai shita. Korera aku o okonau mono koso wazawaidearu. Kunō no hi no chōbatsu no tame ni.
43|66|Kare-ra wa, tada matte iru no ka. Kare-ra ga ishiki shinai toki ni, totsuzen yattekuru (shinpan no) toki o.
43|67|Sonohi,-nushi o osoreru mono o nozoite wa,(shitashī) tomo mo tagaini teki to narou.
43|68|Waga shimo be yo, sonohi anata gata ni wa osore mo naku, mata urei mo nai.
43|69|Waga shirushi o shinjite,(ware no ishi ni) fukujū, kie shite ita mono yo,
43|70|anata gata, soshite anata gata no haigūsha mo kanki no naka ni rakuen ni ire.'

43|71|Kare-ra ni wa kazukazu no kogane no sara ya hai ga, tsugitsugini mawasa re (rakuen no) nakaniha kakuji no nozomu mono, mata me o yorokobasu mono ga arou. Anata gata wa eien ni soko ni sumu nodearu.
43|72|Kore ga anata gata no okonatta koto ni taishi, anata gata ni tsuga se rareta rakuendearu.
43|73|Soko ni wa anata gata no tame ni hōfuna kajitsu ga ari, soreni anata gata wa manzoku suru.
43|74|Tsumi o okashita mono wa, jigoku no chōbatsu no naka ni eien ni sumu.
43|75|(Chōbatsu wa) kare-ra no tame ni keigen sa rezu, sono Chū de mattaku kibō o ushinau.
43|76|Ware ga kare-ra ni fugi o hataraita node wanai. Kare-ra ga (mizukara) fugi o hataraita nodearu.
43|77|Kare-ra wa,`kanshu yo, anata no omo ni tanonde watashi-tachi no shimatsu o tsukete kudasai.' To sakebu. Shikashi, kare wa (kotaete),`anata gata wa, tairyū shite ireba yoi nodearu.' To iu.
43|78|Ware wa tashika ni anata gata ni shinri o todoketa. Daga anata gata no ōku wa, shinri o kiratta.
43|79|Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyō to-tachi) wa,(shito ni taishi) sakubō o hari megurashita tsumoridarouga, ware koso,(kare-ra ni taishite sakubō o) megurashite aru.
43|80|Soretomo kare-ra wa, ware ga kare-ra no himegoto ya bōgi o, kikanaito demo omou no ka. Iya, waga shito-tachi (tenshi) wa, kare-ra no katawara de kiroku shite iru.
43|81|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Moshi jihibukaki okata ga ko o mota rerunara, kono watashi ga sono saisho no sūhai-sha to naru.
43|82|Ten to ji no shu,(taiken no) gyokuza no shu, kare-ra no haisuru mono o (chōzetsu nasa reru) omo ni tatae are. '
43|83|Sorede anata gata wa, yakusoku sa reta kare-ra no hi ni tō mensuru made, kare-ra o mudaguchi to tawamure ni hōchi shite okuga ī.
43|84|Kare koso wa ten ni okeru kami, mata ji ni okeru kamideari, eimei ni shite zenchi de ara reru.

43|85|Ten to ji no taiken, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono ga kizoku suru kata, kare ni shukufuku ga aru yō ni. Mata kare no omoto ni dake (shinpan no)-ji no chishiki wa ari, ware no omoto ni anata gata wa kisa reru nodearu.
43|86|Kare no soto ni, kare-ra ga inoru mono wa, torinasu chikara o motanai. Tada shinri o jisshō suru mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra wa (shito o) shitte iru.
43|87|Moshi anata ga kare-ra ni,`dare ga kare-ra o tsukutta nodesu ka.' To toeba, kanarazu `arrā.' To iu. Sorenanoni, kare-ra wa dōshite (shinri kara) mayoi saru no ka.
43|88|(Ware wa yogen-sha ga) `omo yo, korera no mono wa hontōni fushin no mindesu.' To iu no o (kiita).
43|89|(Sorede omo wa ōse rareta. ) Kare-ra kara sorete sari nasai,daga `heian'are.' To (aisatsu shite) ii nasai. Yagate kare-ra mo shirudearou.
